alert.note: Alert for Northern Monterey Bay; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 2:38PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A shower producing small hail will impact portions of northwestern Santa Cruz and southeastern San Mateo Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 237 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a shower producing small hail 11 miles southwest of Ben Lomond, or 12 miles west of Santa Cruz, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Lightning will be possible with this shower. Locations impacted include... Boulder Creek and Ben Lomond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Monterey Bay; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Cruz Mountains
